content.title: Comprehensive Care for Every Stage of Life
content.description: At Wezi Medical Centre, our team of specialists provides trusted healthcare from surgery to pediatrics, gynecology, and general medicine.

content.title: Quality Healthcare for Everyone
content.description: With experienced doctors in surgery, women’s health, pediatrics, and adult medicine, WMC is here to care for you and your family.

content.title: Specialist Care, Compassionate Service
content.description: Our dedicated team of medical experts combines years of experience with personalized care to keep you and your loved ones healthy.

services.description: At Wezi Medical Centre, we provide comprehensive healthcare services with the highest standards of medical excellence and patient care.

cards.title: General Surgery
cards.description: Comprehensive surgical care with skilled professionals ensuring safe and effective procedures.

cards.title: Obstetrics & Gynecology
cards.description: Dedicated women’s health services, including prenatal care, childbirth, and gynecological treatments.

cards.title: Vaccinations
cards.description: Protect yourself and your loved ones with essential vaccines for children, adults, and travel needs.

cards.title: Diagnostics
cards.description: Accurate and timely medical diagnostics to guide effective treatment and improve health outcomes.

cards.title: Routine Check-Ups
cards.description: Stay on top of your health with regular check-ups designed to detect issues early and keep you well.

faqs.description: Find answers to common questions about our services, appointments, and facilities. Use the search and filters below to quickly find what you're looking for.

footer.description: Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is here to help you with any additional questions or concerns about our medical services and facilities.

entries.question: What are your operating hours?
entries.answer: Wezi Medical Centre operates 24/7, providing round-the-clock medical services every day of the year. Our dedicated team of healthcare professionals is always available to provide emergency care, routine consultations, and comprehensive medical services whenever you need them. No appointment necessary for emergencies.

entries.question: Do you accept insurance coverage?
entries.answer: Yes, we accept most major insurance plans including National Health Insurance, private medical insurance, and corporate health schemes. We also work with international insurance providers. Please bring your insurance card and valid identification when visiting. Our dedicated billing department can help verify your coverage and explain any co-payments or deductibles.

entries.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
entries.answer: Scheduling is easy and convenient! Call us at 0880 33 39 80, email wezi.enquiries@gmail.com, or visit our facility at Mapale, Mzuzu. Since we're always open, you can contact us anytime. For specialized services like surgery consultations or specific specialists, we recommend calling ahead to ensure availability.

entries.question: What should I bring to my first visit?
entries.answer: For your first visit, please bring: valid identification (passport or national ID), insurance card (if applicable), complete list of current medications with dosages, any previous medical records or test results, referral letters from other doctors, and a written list of questions or health concerns you'd like to discuss with your healthcare provider.

entries.question: Do you provide emergency services?
entries.answer: Absolutely! Wezi Medical Centre provides comprehensive 24/7 emergency medical services. Our emergency department is fully equipped with modern medical equipment and staffed by qualified emergency medicine physicians and nurses around the clock. We handle everything from minor injuries to life-threatening emergencies. Call 0880 33 39 80 immediately for emergencies.

entries.question: What vaccination services do you offer?
entries.answer: We provide comprehensive vaccination services for all age groups, including routine childhood immunizations, adult boosters, travel vaccines, seasonal flu shots, COVID-19 vaccinations, and occupational health vaccines. Our vaccination schedules follow WHO guidelines and international standards. We also offer vaccination certificates for travel requirements.

entries.question: How long do diagnostic test results take?
entries.answer: Most routine blood tests and basic diagnostic procedures have results available within 24-48 hours. Complex tests like cultures or specialized panels may take 3-7 days. Urgent tests can be processed within 2-4 hours when medically necessary. We'll contact you promptly when results are ready and schedule follow-up appointments as needed.

entries.question: Do you offer maternity packages?
entries.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive maternity care packages including prenatal consultations, nutritional counseling, delivery services with modern birthing suites, postnatal care, breastfeeding support, and complete newborn care. Our experienced obstetrics team provides personalized care throughout your pregnancy journey in our comfortable, family-friendly facility.

greeting.weziBotGreeting: How can Wezi Bot help you today?

dashboard.hod: Good day! Thank you for leading your department and ensuring top-quality patient care at Wezi Clinic.
dashboard.doctor: Hello Doctor! Thank you for your dedication and for providing exceptional medical care to our patients.
dashboard.nurse: Good day! Thank you for your hard work and compassionate care in supporting our patients every day.
dashboard.patient: Welcome! We hope you have a smooth and comfortable experience at Wezi Clinic. Your health is our priority.
dashboard.ambulance_driver: Hello! Thank you for being ready to respond quickly and providing vital emergency support at Wezi Clinic.
